data.lyric:
[ti:Time]
[ar:NF]
[al:Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Time (Edit) - NF
[00:03.05]Lyrics by：Nate Feuerstein/Tommee Profitt
[00:06.11]Composed by：Nate Feuerstein/Tommee Profitt
[00:09.16]Even if we both break down tonight
[00:13.73]And you say you hate me
[00:15.81]And we go to bed angry
[00:18.52]I know everything will be alright
[00:23.71]I'll be here waiting
[00:25.53]I promise I'm changing
[00:28.62]I just need
[00:30.42]A little time to show you I'm worth it
[00:32.13]I know that I can be a difficult person
[00:34.57]I'm a stress case
[00:35.33]Drive you up the wall when I'm workin'
[00:36.90]Actually I'm probably worse when I'm not
[00:38.70]You don't deserve it
[00:39.36]Make you nervous 'cause you know I'ma break soon
[00:41.51]Every time I do
[00:42.44]I say somethin' that hurts you
[00:43.97]Actin' like I'm gone
[00:44.84]But we both in the same room
[00:46.26]I don't like to be wrong
[00:47.23]Which I know you relate to
[00:48.80]And I know I make you feel like
[00:50.33]You're at the end of your road
[00:51.48]That's when I look at you
[00:52.46]And tell you I'd be better alone
[00:54.05]Just the pride talkin' isn't it
[00:55.20]'Cause both of us know
[00:56.38]I'm the definition of wreck if you look into my soul
[00:58.73]Comes out the most
[00:59.78]When I feel I'm in a vulnerable place
[01:01.35]Made a lot of mistakes
[01:02.34]I wish I knew how to erase
[01:03.66]When I'm afraid might get distant and I push you away
[01:06.04]But no matter the case
[01:07.35]I'ma do whatever it takes even if
[01:08.58]Even if we both break down tonight
[01:12.58]And you say you hate me
[01:14.65]And we go to bed angry
[01:17.40]I know everything will be alright
[01:22.44]I'll be here waiting I promise I'm changing
[01:27.37]I just need
[01:28.58]Time
[01:30.67]Oh
[01:32.47]I I need time
[01:35.42]Oh oh
[01:37.28]I just need time
[01:40.45]Oh
[01:42.24]I I need time
[01:44.96]Oh
[01:45.86]Time
[01:46.54]Oh
[01:46.78]Time
[01:47.62]Oh
[01:48.60]Yeah way before I bought you the ring
[01:50.37]We were fighting back and forth
[01:51.53]Like you were wearin' the thing
[01:52.85]Two passionate people not afraid to say what they think
[01:54.94]Lead to passionate conversation when it's hard to agree
[01:57.63]You know me well
[01:58.43]Sittin' on the edge of my seat
[01:59.99]Lookin' at life
[02:00.88]Overanalyzin' everything
[02:02.46]Always depressed
[02:03.40]Tryna find a better version of me
[02:04.83]Searching for somethin' I know's prolly right in front of my feet
[02:07.36]Stubborn as me
[02:08.12]Maybe not but you're close to it
[02:09.61]Got a lot of issues
[02:10.76]I'm tryin' to work through 'em
[02:12.06]Going to therapy for you's somethin' that's worth doin'
[02:14.32]When I know you been there for me
[02:15.81]Through all of my worst moments
[02:16.76]And I know it hurts knowing that
[02:18.39]I carry this weight on my chest
[02:19.68]Making it difficult for me to open up and connect
[02:22.06]Lot of regrets
[02:22.97]I apologize for all of the stress
[02:24.48]That's not what I meant to do
[02:25.87]You know I love you to death even if
[02:27.19]Even if we both break down tonight
[02:30.93]And you say you hate me
[02:32.86]And we go to bed angry
[02:35.68]I know everything will be alright
[02:40.58]I'll be here waiting I promise I'm changing
[02:45.76]I just need
[02:47.00]Time
[02:49.00]Oh
[02:50.77]I I need time
[02:53.91]Oh oh
[02:55.78]I just need time
[02:58.75]Oh
[03:00.62]I I need time
[03:03.68]Oh
[03:04.17]Time
[03:04.94]Oh time
[03:05.48]Oh
[03:05.90]I just need time
[03:08.48]Oh
[03:10.44]I I need time
[03:13.47]Oh oh
[03:15.23]I just need time
[03:18.35]Oh
[03:19.88]I I need time
[03:23.09]Oh
[03:23.73]Time
[03:24.53]Oh time
[03:25.37]Oh
data.trans:
[ti:Time]
[ar:NF]
[al:Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.05]//
[00:06.10]//
[00:09.16]即使今晚我俩闹翻了
[00:13.73]你说你恨我
[00:15.81]连睡觉都满腔怒火
[00:18.52]我知道 一切都会好起来的
[00:23.71]我会耐心等待
[00:25.53]我保证 我会改
[00:28.62]我只是需要
[00:30.42]一点时间 向你证明 我值得你花费时间
[00:32.13]我知道有时候我很难对付
[00:34.57]我总是给你带来压力
[00:35.33]工作时太忘我 忽略了你的感受
[00:36.90]事实上 如果我不工作 我可能会更可恶
[00:38.70]你不该遭受这样的罪
[00:39.36]你很紧张 因为你知道我很快就会停下工作
[00:41.51]每当我停止工作
[00:42.44]我都会说些伤害你的话
[00:43.97]好像我不在你身边一样
[00:44.84]但我们明明都在同一间屋子里
[00:46.26]我不想犯错
[00:47.23]我知道你理解我的
[00:48.80]我知道我让你感觉
[00:50.33]走投无路
[00:51.48]那时候我总是看着你
[00:52.46]告诉你 我还是一个人过算了吧
[00:54.05]说这些话都是为了尊严 对不对
[00:55.20]因为我俩都知道
[00:56.38]如果你仔细看我的心 你会看见一片废墟
[00:58.73]当我感觉自己很脆弱的时候
[00:59.78]我就特别想要发泄
[01:01.35]犯下很多措
[01:02.34]我希望自己知道如何弥补
[01:03.66]当我感到害怕时 可能会疏远你 把你推得远远的
[01:06.04]但是不管怎样
[01:07.35]我会不顾一切 即使
[01:08.58]即使今晚我俩闹翻了
[01:12.58]你说你恨我
[01:14.65]连睡觉都满腔怒火
[01:17.40]我知道 一切都会好起来的
[01:22.44]我会耐心等待 我保证 我会改
[01:27.37]我只是需要
[01:28.58]时间
[01:30.67]//
[01:32.47]我需要时间
[01:35.42]//
[01:37.28]我只是需要时间
[01:40.45]//
[01:42.24]我需要时间
[01:44.96]//
[01:45.86]时间
[01:46.54]//
[01:46.78]时间
[01:47.62]//
[01:48.60]很早以前 我们还没结婚
[01:50.37]我们争吵得没完没了
[01:51.53]就像你承受了巨大的委屈
[01:52.85]两个情意绵绵的人口不择言
[01:54.94]演变成激烈的争吵 无法言和
[01:57.63]你很了解我
[01:58.43]正襟危坐
[01:59.99]审视着人生
[02:00.88]对一切都过度忧虑
[02:02.46]总是很消沉
[02:03.40]我想要变成更好的自己
[02:04.83]盲目寻找近在眼前的东西
[02:07.36]我很固执吗
[02:08.12]可能并非如此 但你也差不多
[02:09.61]面临很多问题
[02:10.76]我想要将它们通通解决
[02:12.06]专门去看医生 因为你值得我这样做
[02:14.32]我知道你一直陪在我身边
[02:15.81]帮我度过最艰难的时光
[02:16.76]我知道 看着我背负如此重压
[02:18.39]你也很难受
[02:19.68]这让我更难敞开心扉和你沟通
[02:22.06]遗憾有很多
[02:22.97]对不起 让你承受了这么大的压力
[02:24.48]我不是故意的
[02:25.87]你知道 我爱你一辈子 即使
[02:27.19]即使今晚我俩闹翻了
[02:30.93]你说你恨我
[02:32.86]连睡觉都满腔怒火
[02:35.68]我知道 一切都会好起来的
[02:40.58]我会耐心等待 我保证 我会改
[02:45.76]我只是需要
[02:47.00]时间
[02:49.00]//
[02:50.77]我需要时间
[02:53.91]//
[02:55.78]我只是需要时间
[02:58.75]//
[03:00.62]我需要时间
[03:03.68]//
